alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lafayette and north central Dixie Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 505 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Mayo, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Pedro Junction and Cooks Hammock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
